Pre-Game Insights: The series will be Rohit Sharma's return to T20I after a 14-month hiatus, with Virat Kohli also making his comeback.
The match on 11 January is the first of the three-game series, with the next matches on 14 January and 17 January.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will be live streamed on JioCinema and telecasted on Sports 18 Network.
Both teams have revealed their squads, with Rohit Sharma leading India and Ibrahim Zadran captaining Afghanistan.
